vue/attribute-hyphenation.name: vue/attribute-hyphenation
vue/attribute-hyphenation.description: 限制自定义组件的属性风格

vue/attributes-order.name: vue/attributes-order
vue/attributes-order.description: 标签属性必须按规则排序
vue/attributes-order.badExample: <template> <div ref="header" v-for="item in items" v-once id="uniqueID" v-model="headerData" my-prop="prop" v-if="!visible" is="header" @click="functionCall" v-text="textContent" /> </template>
vue/attributes-order.goodExample: <template> <div is="header" v-for="item in items" v-if="!visible" v-once id="uniqueID" ref="header" v-model="headerData" my-prop="prop" @click="functionCall" v-text="textContent" /> </template>

vue/block-lang.name: vue/block-lang
vue/block-lang.description: <script> 标签必须有 lang 属性

vue/camelcase.name: vue/camelcase
vue/camelcase.description: 变量名必须是 camelCase 风格的
vue/camelcase.reason: 很多 api 或文件名都不是 camelCase 风格的

vue/comment-directive.name: vue/comment-directive
vue/comment-directive.description: 支持在模版中使用 eslint-disable-next-line 等注释
vue/comment-directive.goodExample: <template> <!-- eslint-disable-next-line vue/eqeqeq --> <div :attr="foo == 1" /> </template>

vue/component-api-style.name: vue/component-api-style
vue/component-api-style.description: 限制组件接口定义的模式

vue/component-definition-name-casing.name: vue/component-definition-name-casing
vue/component-definition-name-casing.description: 组件的 name 属性必须符合 PascalCase
vue/component-definition-name-casing.badExample: <script> export default { name: 'foo-bar', }; </script>
vue/component-definition-name-casing.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'FooBar', }; </script>

vue/component-options-name-casing.name: vue/component-options-name-casing
vue/component-options-name-casing.description: 限制组件名称的命名规范

vue/component-tags-order.name: vue/component-tags-order
vue/component-tags-order.description: 组件中必须按照 <script>, <template>, <style> 排序
vue/component-tags-order.badExample: <style></style> <script></script> <template></template>
vue/component-tags-order.goodExample: <script></script> <template></template> <style></style>

vue/custom-event-name-casing.name: vue/custom-event-name-casing
vue/custom-event-name-casing.description: 自定义事件名必须用 camelCase 风格
vue/custom-event-name-casing.badExample: <template> <button @click="$emit('my-event')" /> </template> <script> export default { methods: { onClick() { this.$emit('my-event'); }, }, }; </script>
vue/custom-event-name-casing.goodExample: <template> <button @click="$emit('myEvent')" /> </template> <script> export default { methods: { onClick() { this.$emit('myEvent'); this.$emit('update:myProp', myProp); }, }, }; </script>

vue/define-emits-declaration.name: vue/define-emits-declaration
vue/define-emits-declaration.description: 约束 defineEmits 定义 emit 的格式

vue/define-macros-order.name: vue/define-macros-order
vue/define-macros-order.description: 必须按规则排序 defineEmits 和 defineProps
vue/define-macros-order.badExample: <script setup> defineEmits(/* ... */); defineProps(/* ... */); </script>
vue/define-macros-order.goodExample: <!-- ✓ GOOD --> <script setup> defineProps(/* ... */); defineEmits(/* ... */); </script>

vue/define-props-declaration.name: vue/define-props-declaration
vue/define-props-declaration.description: 约束 defineProps 定义 props 的格式

vue/dot-notation.name: vue/dot-notation
vue/dot-notation.description: 禁止使用 foo['bar']，必须写成 foo.bar
vue/dot-notation.reason: 当需要写一系列属性的时候，可以更统一

vue/eqeqeq.name: vue/eqeqeq
vue/eqeqeq.description: 必须使用 === 或 !==，禁止使用 == 或 !=
vue/eqeqeq.badExample: <template> <div :attr="foo == 1" /> </template>
vue/eqeqeq.goodExample: <template> <div :attr="foo === 1" /> </template>

vue/first-attribute-linebreak.name: vue/first-attribute-linebreak
vue/first-attribute-linebreak.description: 标签的第一个属性必须换行
vue/first-attribute-linebreak.reason: 代码格式问题，最好由 Prettier 解决

vue/html-button-has-type.name: vue/html-button-has-type
vue/html-button-has-type.description: button 标签必须有 type 属性

vue/html-comment-content-newline.name: vue/html-comment-content-newline
vue/html-comment-content-newline.description: HTML 注释的 <!-- 后必须有空格或换行符
vue/html-comment-content-newline.reason: 代码格式问题，最好由 Prettier 解决

vue/html-comment-content-spacing.name: vue/html-comment-content-spacing
vue/html-comment-content-spacing.description: HTML 注释必须有首位空格
vue/html-comment-content-spacing.reason: 代码格式问题，最好由 Prettier 解决

vue/html-comment-indent.name: vue/html-comment-indent
vue/html-comment-indent.description: HTML 注释缩进必须有两个空格
vue/html-comment-indent.reason: 代码格式问题，最好由 Prettier 解决

vue/jsx-uses-vars.name: vue/jsx-uses-vars
vue/jsx-uses-vars.description: 修复 no-unused-vars 不检查 jsx 的问题

vue/match-component-file-name.name: vue/match-component-file-name
vue/match-component-file-name.description: 组件名称必须和文件名一致

vue/match-component-import-name.name: vue/match-component-import-name
vue/match-component-import-name.description: 导出的组件名称必须保持一致性

vue/max-lines-per-block.name: vue/max-lines-per-block
vue/max-lines-per-block.description: 限制单文件组件块中的最大行数

vue/multi-word-component-names.name: vue/multi-word-component-names
vue/multi-word-component-names.description: 组件名称必须是两个以上的单词

vue/new-line-between-multi-line-property.name: vue/new-line-between-multi-line-property
vue/new-line-between-multi-line-property.description: 多行属性之间必须有空行
vue/new-line-between-multi-line-property.reason: 代码格式问题，最好由 Prettier 解决

vue/next-tick-style.name: vue/next-tick-style
vue/next-tick-style.description: nextTick 必须使用 Promise 模式调用

vue/no-arrow-functions-in-watch.name: vue/no-arrow-functions-in-watch
vue/no-arrow-functions-in-watch.description: watch 中禁止使用箭头函数
vue/no-arrow-functions-in-watch.badExample: <script> export default { watch: { foo: (val, oldVal) => { console.log('new: %s, old: %s', val, oldVal); }, }, }; </script>
vue/no-arrow-functions-in-watch.goodExample: <script> export default { watch: { a: function (val, oldVal) { console.log('new: %s, old: %s', val, oldVal); }, b: 'someMethod', }, }; </script>

vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.name: vue/no-async-in-computed-properties
vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.description: 计算属性禁止包含异步方法
vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.badExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo: async function () { return await someFunc(); }, bar() { return new Promise(); }, baz() { setTimeout(() => {}, 0); }, }, }; </script>
vue/no-async-in-computed-properties.goodExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo() { return someFunc(); }, }, }; </script>

vue/no-bare-strings-in-template.name: vue/no-bare-strings-in-template
vue/no-bare-strings-in-template.description: 禁止 <template> 中使用字符串

vue/no-boolean-default.name: vue/no-boolean-default
vue/no-boolean-default.description: 禁止给布尔值 props 添加默认值
vue/no-boolean-default.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/no-child-content.name: vue/no-child-content
vue/no-child-content.description: 禁止有 v-html 或 v-text 属性的标签内部还有内容
vue/no-child-content.badExample: <template> <div v-html="replacesChildContent">child content</div> </template>
vue/no-child-content.goodExample: <template> <div>child content</div> <div v-html="replacesChildContent"></div> </template>

vue/no-computed-properties-in-data.name: vue/no-computed-properties-in-data
vue/no-computed-properties-in-data.description: 禁止 data() 中有计算属性
vue/no-computed-properties-in-data.badExample: <script> export default { data() { return { bar: this.foo, }; }, computed: { foo() {}, }, }; </script>
vue/no-computed-properties-in-data.goodExample: <script> export default { data() { return { bar: 1, }; }, computed: { foo() {}, }, }; </script>

vue/no-constant-condition.name: vue/no-constant-condition
vue/no-constant-condition.description: 禁止将常量作为分支条件判断中的测试表达式，但允许作为循环条件判断中的测试表达式

vue/no-deprecated-data-object-declaratio.name: vue/no-deprecated-data-object-declaration
vue/no-deprecated-data-object-declaratio.description: 禁止在 data 中使用已废弃的对象定义
vue/no-deprecated-data-object-declaratio.badExample: <script> export default { data: { foo: null, }, }; </script>
vue/no-deprecated-data-object-declaratio.goodExample: <script> export default { data() { return { foo: null, }; }, }; </script>

vue/no-deprecated-destroyed-lifecycle.name: vue/no-deprecated-destroyed-lifecycle
vue/no-deprecated-destroyed-lifecycle.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 destroyed 和 beforeDestroy 生命周期
vue/no-deprecated-destroyed-lifecycle.badExample: <script> export default { beforeDestroy() {}, destroyed() {}, }; </script>
vue/no-deprecated-destroyed-lifecycle.goodExample: <script> export default { beforeMount() {}, mounted() {}, beforeUnmount() {}, unmounted() {}, }; </script>

vue/no-deprecated-dollar-listeners-api.name: vue/no-deprecated-dollar-listeners-api
vue/no-deprecated-dollar-listeners-api.badExample: <template> <MyInput v-on="$listeners" /> </template> <script> export default { computed: { listeners() { return { ...this.$listeners, input() { /* */ }, }; }, }, }; </script>
vue/no-deprecated-dollar-listeners-api.goodExample: <template></template> <script> export default { computed: { listeners() { return { input() { /* */ }, }; }, }, }; </script>

vue/no-deprecated-dollar-scopedslots-api.name: vue/no-deprecated-dollar-scopedslots-api
vue/no-deprecated-dollar-scopedslots-api.badExample: <template> <div v-if="$scopedSlots.default"><slot /></div> </template> <script> export default { render() { return this.$scopedSlots.default(); }, }; </script>
vue/no-deprecated-dollar-scopedslots-api.goodExample: <template></template> <script> export default {}; </script>

vue/no-deprecated-events-api.name: vue/no-deprecated-events-api
vue/no-deprecated-events-api.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 events 接口
vue/no-deprecated-events-api.badExample: <script> export default { mounted() { this.$on('start', function (args) { console.log('start'); }); this.$emit('start'); }, }; </script>
vue/no-deprecated-events-api.goodExample: <script> import mitt from 'mitt'; const emitter = mitt(); export default { mounted() { emitter.on('start', function (args) { console.log('start'); }); emitter.emit('start'); }, }; </script>

vue/no-deprecated-filter.name: vue/no-deprecated-filter
vue/no-deprecated-filter.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 filters 语法
vue/no-deprecated-filter.badExample: <template> {{ msg | filter }} {{ msg | filter('€') }} {{ msg | filterA | filterB }} <div v-bind:id="msg | filter"></div> <div v-bind:id="msg | filter('€')"></div> <div v-bind:id="msg | filterA | filterB"></div> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-filter.goodExample: <template> {{ filter(msg) }} {{ filter(msg, '€') }} {{ filterB(filterA(msg)) }} <div v-bind:id="filter(msg)"></div> <div v-bind:id="filter(msg, '€')"></div> <div v-bind:id="filterB(filterA(msg))"></div> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-functional-template.name: vue/no-deprecated-functional-template
vue/no-deprecated-functional-template.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 functional 模版
vue/no-deprecated-functional-template.badExample: <template functional> <!-- ... --> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-functional-template.goodExample: <template> <!-- ... --> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-html-element-is.name: vue/no-deprecated-html-element-is
vue/no-deprecated-html-element-is.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 is 属性
vue/no-deprecated-html-element-is.badExample: <template> <div is="foo" /> <div :is="foo" /> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-html-element-is.goodExample: <template> <div /> <component is="foo" /> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-inline-template.name: vue/no-deprecated-inline-template
vue/no-deprecated-inline-template.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 inline-template 属性
vue/no-deprecated-inline-template.badExample: <template> <my-component inline-template> <div> <p>These are compiled as the component's own template.</p> <p>Not parent's transclusion content.</p> </div> </my-component> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-inline-template.goodExample: <template> <my-comnponent /> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-props-default-this.name: vue/no-deprecated-props-default-this
vue/no-deprecated-props-default-this.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 this
vue/no-deprecated-props-default-this.badExample: <script> export default { props: { a: String, b: { default() { return this.a; }, }, }, }; </script>
vue/no-deprecated-props-default-this.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { a: String, b: { default(props) { /* ✓ GOOD */ return props.a; }, }, }, }; </script>

vue/no-deprecated-router-link-tag-prop.name: vue/no-deprecated-router-link-tag-prop
vue/no-deprecated-router-link-tag-prop.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 tag 属性
vue/no-deprecated-router-link-tag-prop.badExample: <template> <RouterLink tag="div" to="/">Home</RouterLink> <router-link tag="div" to="/">Home</router-link> <RouterLink :tag="someVariable" to="/">Home</RouterLink> <router-link :tag="someVariable" to="/">Home</router-link> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-router-link-tag-prop.goodExample: <template> <RouterLink to="/">Home</RouterLink> <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> <RouterLink to="/"> <div>Home</div> </RouterLink> <router-link to="/"> <div>Home</div> </router-link> <NuxtLink tag="div" to="/">Home</NuxtLink> <nuxt-link tag="div" to="/">Home</nuxt-link> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.name: vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute
vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.description: 禁用已废弃的 scope 属性
vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.badExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template slot="name" scope="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-scope-attribute.goodExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template v-slot:name="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> <template slot="name" slot-scope="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-slot-attribute.name: vue/no-deprecated-slot-attribute
vue/no-deprecated-slot-attribute.description: 使用 v-slot 替代已废弃的 slot
vue/no-deprecated-slot-attribute.badExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template slot="name"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-slot-attribute.goodExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template v-slot:name> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-slot-scope-attribute.name: vue/no-deprecated-slot-scope-attribute
vue/no-deprecated-slot-scope-attribute.badExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template slot-scope="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-slot-scope-attribute.goodExample: <template> <ListComponent> <template v-slot="props"> {{ props.title }} </template> </ListComponent> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-v-bind-sync.name: vue/no-deprecated-v-bind-sync
vue/no-deprecated-v-bind-sync.description: 禁止在 v-bind 指令中使用已废弃的 .sync 修饰符
vue/no-deprecated-v-bind-sync.badExample: <template> <MyComponent v-bind:propName.sync="foo" /> <MyComponent v-bind:[dynamiArg].sync="foo" /> <MyComponent v-bind.sync="foo" /> <MyComponent :propName.sync="foo" /> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-v-bind-sync.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent v-bind:propName="foo" /> <MyComponent :propName="foo" /> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-v-is.name: vue/no-deprecated-v-is
vue/no-deprecated-v-is.description: 禁用已废弃的 v-is 指令
vue/no-deprecated-v-is.badExample: <template> <div v-is="'MyComponent'" /> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-v-is.goodExample: <template> <div is="vue:MyComponent" /> <component is="MyComponent" /> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-v-on-native-modifier.name: vue/no-deprecated-v-on-native-modifier
vue/no-deprecated-v-on-native-modifier.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 .native 修饰符
vue/no-deprecated-v-on-native-modifier.badExample: <template> <CoolInput v-on:keydown.native="onKeydown" /> <CoolInput @keydown.enter.native="onKeydownEnter" /> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-v-on-native-modifier.goodExample: <template> <CoolInput v-on:keydown.enter="onKeydownEnter" /> <CoolInput @keydown.enter="onKeydownEnter" /> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-v-on-number-modifiers.name: vue/no-deprecated-v-on-number-modifiers
vue/no-deprecated-v-on-number-modifiers.description: 禁止使用已废弃的数字修饰符
vue/no-deprecated-v-on-number-modifiers.badExample: <template> <input v-on:keyup.34="onArrowUp" /> <input @keyup.34="onArrowUp" /> </template>
vue/no-deprecated-v-on-number-modifiers.goodExample: <template> <input v-on:keyup.page-down="onArrowUp" /> <input @keyup.page-down="onArrowUp" /> <input @keyup.9="onArrowUp" /> <!-- 9 is KeyboardEvent.key --> </template>

vue/no-deprecated-vue-config-keycodes.name: vue/no-deprecated-vue-config-keycodes
vue/no-deprecated-vue-config-keycodes.description: 禁止使用已废弃的 Vue.config.keyCodes

vue/no-dupe-keys.name: vue/no-dupe-keys
vue/no-dupe-keys.badExample: <script> export default { props: { foo: String, }, computed: { foo: { get() {}, }, }, data: { foo: null, }, methods: { foo() {}, }, }; </script>
vue/no-dupe-keys.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { foo1: String, }, computed: { foo2: { get() {}, }, }, data: { foo3: null, }, methods: { foo4() {}, }, }; </script>

vue/no-dupe-v-else-if.name: vue/no-dupe-v-else-if
vue/no-dupe-v-else-if.description: 禁止在 v-if 和 v-else-if 中出现重复的测试表达式
vue/no-dupe-v-else-if.badExample: <template> <div v-if="isSomething(x)" /> <div v-else-if="isSomething(x)" /> <div v-if="a" /> <div v-else-if="b" /> <div v-else-if="c && d" /> <div v-else-if="c && d" /> <div v-if="n === 1" /> <div v-else-if="n === 2" /> <div v-else-if="n === 3" /> <div v-else-if="n === 2" /> <div v-else-if="n === 5" /> </template>
vue/no-dupe-v-else-if.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="isSomething(x)" /> <div v-else-if="isSomethingElse(x)" /> <div v-if="a" /> <div v-else-if="b" /> <div v-else-if="c && d" /> <div v-else-if="c && e" /> <div v-if="n === 1" /> <div v-else-if="n === 2" /> <div v-else-if="n === 3" /> <div v-else-if="n === 4" /> <div v-else-if="n === 5" /> </template>

vue/no-duplicate-attr-inheritance.name: vue/no-duplicate-attr-inheritance
vue/no-duplicate-attr-inheritance.description: 使用 v-bind="$attrs" 时 inheritAttrs 必须是 false
vue/no-duplicate-attr-inheritance.badExample: <template> <MyInput v-bind="$attrs" /> </template> <script> export default { // inheritAttrs: true (default) }; </script>
vue/no-duplicate-attr-inheritance.goodExample: <template> <MyInput v-bind="$attrs" /> </template> <script> export default { inheritAttrs: false, }; </script>

vue/no-duplicate-attributes.name: vue/no-duplicate-attributes
vue/no-duplicate-attributes.badExample: <template> <MyComponent :foo="abc" foo="def" /> <MyComponent foo="abc" :foo="def" /> <MyComponent foo="abc" foo="def" /> <MyComponent :foo.a="abc" :foo.b="def" /> <MyComponent class="abc" :class="def" /> </template>
vue/no-duplicate-attributes.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent :foo="abc" /> <MyComponent foo="abc" /> <MyComponent :foo.a="abc" /> <MyComponent class="abc" /> </template>

vue/no-empty-component-block.name: vue/no-empty-component-block
vue/no-empty-component-block.badExample: <template></template> <template /> <template src="" /> <script></script> <script /> <script src="" /> <style></style> <style /> <style src="" />
vue/no-empty-component-block.goodExample: <template> <p>foo</p> </template> <script> console.log('foo'); </script> <style> p { display: inline; } </style> <template src="./template.html"></template> <template src="./template.html" /> <script src="./script.js"></script> <script src="./script.js" /> <style src="./style.css"></style> <style src="./style.css" />

vue/no-empty-pattern.name: vue/no-empty-pattern
vue/no-empty-pattern.description: 禁止解构赋值中出现空 {} 或 []
vue/no-empty-pattern.badExample: <template> <div @click=" () => { const {} = foo; } " ></div> </template>
vue/no-empty-pattern.goodExample: <template> <div @click=" () => { const { bar } = foo; } " ></div> </template>

vue/no-export-in-script-setup.name: vue/no-export-in-script-setup
vue/no-export-in-script-setup.description: 禁止在 <script setup> 中使用 export
vue/no-export-in-script-setup.badExample: <script setup> export let msg = 'Hello!'; </script>
vue/no-export-in-script-setup.goodExample: <script setup> let msg = 'Hello!'; </script>

vue/no-expose-after-await.name: vue/no-expose-after-await
vue/no-expose-after-await.description: 禁止在 await 之后调用 expose
vue/no-expose-after-await.badExample: <script> import { watch } from 'vue'; export default { async setup(props, { expose }) { await doSomething(); expose({}); }, }; </script>
vue/no-expose-after-await.goodExample: <script> import { watch } from 'vue'; export default { async setup(props, { expose }) { expose({}); await doSomething(); }, }; </script>

vue/no-irregular-whitespace.name: vue/no-irregular-whitespace
vue/no-irregular-whitespace.description: 禁止使用特殊空白符（比如全角空格），除非是出现在字符串、正则表达式或模版字符串中
vue/no-irregular-whitespace.badExample: <script> const foo　= '' </script> <template> <div class="foo　bar"></div> </template>
vue/no-irregular-whitespace.goodExample: <script> const foo = '　'; const bar = /　/; const baz = `　`; </script> <template> <div class="foo bar">　</div> </template>

vue/no-lifecycle-after-await.name: vue/no-lifecycle-after-await
vue/no-lifecycle-after-await.description: 禁止异步注册生命周期
vue/no-lifecycle-after-await.badExample: <script> import { onMounted } from 'vue'; export default { async setup() { await doSomething(); onMounted(() => {}); }, }; </script>
vue/no-lifecycle-after-await.goodExample: <script> import { onMounted } from 'vue'; export default { async setup() { onMounted(() => {}); await doSomething(); }, }; </script>

vue/no-lone-template.name: vue/no-lone-template
vue/no-lone-template.badExample: <template> <template>...</template> <template /> </template>
vue/no-lone-template.goodExample: <template> <template v-if="foo">...</template> <template v-else-if="bar">...</template> <template v-else>...</template> <template v-for="e in list">...</template> <template v-slot>...</template> </template>

vue/no-loss-of-precision.name: vue/no-loss-of-precision
vue/no-loss-of-precision.description: 禁止使用超出 js 精度范围的数字
vue/no-loss-of-precision.badExample: <template> {{ 5123000000000000000000000000001 }} </template>
vue/no-loss-of-precision.goodExample: <template> {{ 12345 }} </template>

vue/no-multiple-objects-in-class.name: vue/no-multiple-objects-in-class
vue/no-multiple-objects-in-class.description: 禁止 class 中出现复数的对象
vue/no-multiple-objects-in-class.badExample: <template> <div> <div :class="[{ foo: isFoo }, { bar: isBar }]" /> </div> </template>
vue/no-multiple-objects-in-class.goodExample: <template> <div> <div :class="[{ foo: isFoo, bar: isBar }]" /> </div> </template>

vue/no-multiple-slot-args.name: vue/no-multiple-slot-args
vue/no-multiple-slot-args.description: 禁止给 scoped slots 传递多个参数
vue/no-multiple-slot-args.badExample: <script> export default { render(h) { var children = this.$scopedSlots.default(foo, bar); var children = this.$scopedSlots.default(...foo); }, }; </script>
vue/no-multiple-slot-args.goodExample: <script> export default { render(h) { var children = this.$scopedSlots.default(); var children = this.$scopedSlots.default(foo); var children = this.$scopedSlots.default({ foo, bar }); }, }; </script>

vue/no-mutating-props.name: vue/no-mutating-props
vue/no-mutating-props.badExample: <template> <div> <input v-model="value" @click="openModal" /> </div> </template> <script> export default { props: { value: { type: String, required: true, }, }, methods: { openModal() { this.value = 'test'; }, }, }; </script>
vue/no-mutating-props.goodExample: <template> <div> <input :value="value" @input="$emit('input', $event.target.value)" @click="openModal" /> </div> </template> <script> export default { props: { value: { type: String, required: true, }, }, methods: { openModal() { this.$emit('input', 'test'); }, }, }; </script>

vue/no-parsing-error.name: vue/no-parsing-error
vue/no-parsing-error.badExample: <template> <div>{{ message. }}</div> </template>
vue/no-parsing-error.goodExample: <template> <div>{{ message }}</div> </template>

vue/no-ref-as-operand.name: vue/no-ref-as-operand
vue/no-ref-as-operand.description: 禁止直接使用由 ref 生成的变量，必须使用它的 value
vue/no-ref-as-operand.badExample: <script> import { ref } from 'vue'; export default { setup() { const count = ref(0); const ok = ref(true); count++; count + 1; 1 + count; var msg = ok ? 'yes' : 'no'; return { count, }; }, }; </script>
vue/no-ref-as-operand.goodExample: <script> import { ref } from 'vue'; export default { setup() { const count = ref(0); const ok = ref(true); count.value++; count.value + 1; 1 + count.value; var msg = ok.value ? 'yes' : 'no'; return { count, }; }, }; </script>

vue/no-ref-object-destructure.name: vue/no-ref-object-destructure
vue/no-ref-object-destructure.badExample: <script> import { ref } from 'vue'; const count = ref(0); const v1 = count.value; /* ✗ BAD */ const { value: v2 } = count; /* ✗ BAD */ const v4 = fn(count.value); /* ✗ BAD */ </script>
vue/no-ref-object-destructure.goodExample: <script> import { ref } from 'vue'; const count = ref(0); const v3 = computed(() => count.value /* ✓ GOOD */); const v5 = fn(count); /* ✓ GOOD */ const v6 = computed(() => fn(count.value) /* ✓ GOOD */); </script>

vue/no-required-prop-with-default.name: vue/no-required-prop-with-default
vue/no-required-prop-with-default.description: 禁止将有默认值的 prop 设为必选属性

vue/no-reserved-component-names.name: vue/no-reserved-component-names
vue/no-reserved-component-names.description: 组件的 name 属性禁止使用保留字
vue/no-reserved-component-names.badExample: <script> export default { name: 'div', }; </script>
vue/no-reserved-component-names.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'FooBar', }; </script>

vue/no-reserved-keys.name: vue/no-reserved-keys
vue/no-reserved-keys.badExample: <script> export default { props: { $el: String, }, computed: { $on: { get() {}, }, }, data: { _foo: null, }, methods: { $nextTick() {}, }, }; </script>
vue/no-reserved-keys.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { $element: String, }, computed: { $listen: { get() {}, }, }, data: { foo: null, }, methods: { $next() {}, }, }; </script>

vue/no-reserved-props.name: vue/no-reserved-props
vue/no-reserved-props.badExample: <script> export default { props: { ref: String, key: String, }, }; </script>
vue/no-reserved-props.goodExample: <script> export default { props: { foo: String, bar: String, }, }; </script>

vue/no-restricted-block.name: vue/no-restricted-block
vue/no-restricted-block.description: 禁止在模版中使用指定的 block

vue/no-restricted-call-after-await.name: vue/no-restricted-call-after-await
vue/no-restricted-call-after-await.description: 禁止 await 后调用指定的函数

vue/no-restricted-component-options.name: vue/no-restricted-component-options
vue/no-restricted-component-options.description: 禁止使用指定的组件选项

vue/no-restricted-custom-event.name: vue/no-restricted-custom-event
vue/no-restricted-custom-event.description: 禁止使用特定的自定义事件

vue/no-restricted-v-bind.name: vue/no-restricted-v-bind
vue/no-restricted-v-bind.description: 禁止使用指定的 v-bind 参数

vue/no-root-v-if.name: vue/no-root-v-if
vue/no-root-v-if.description: 禁止在根元素上使用 v-if 指令

vue/no-setup-props-destructure.name: vue/no-setup-props-destructure
vue/no-setup-props-destructure.description: 禁止对 setup 中的 props 解构
vue/no-setup-props-destructure.badExample: <script> export default { setup({ count }) { watch(() => { console.log(count); // not going to detect changes }); return () => { return h('div', count); // not going to update }; }, }; </script>
vue/no-setup-props-destructure.goodExample: <script> export default { setup(props) { watch(() => { console.log(props.count); }); return () => { return h('div', props.count); }; }, }; </script>

vue/no-shared-component-data.name: vue/no-shared-component-data
vue/no-shared-component-data.description: 组件的 data 属性的值必须是一个函数

vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.name: vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properties
vue/no-side-effects-in-computed-properti.description: 禁止在计算属性中对属性修改

vue/no-sparse-arrays.name: vue/no-sparse-arrays
vue/no-sparse-arrays.description: 禁止在数组中出现连续的逗号

vue/no-static-inline-styles.name: vue/no-static-inline-styles
vue/no-static-inline-styles.description: 禁止使用 style 属性

vue/no-template-key.name: vue/no-template-key
vue/no-template-key.description: 禁止 <template> 使用 key 属性

vue/no-template-shadow.name: vue/no-template-shadow
vue/no-template-shadow.description: 模版中的变量名禁止与前一个作用域重名

vue/no-template-target-blank.name: vue/no-template-target-blank
vue/no-template-target-blank.description: 添加了 target="_blank" 属性时，必须添加 rel="noopener noreferrer"

vue/no-textarea-mustache.name: vue/no-textarea-mustache
vue/no-textarea-mustache.description: 禁止在 <textarea> 中出现模版语法 {{message}}
vue/no-textarea-mustache.badExample: <template> <textarea>{{ message }}</textarea> </template>
vue/no-textarea-mustache.goodExample: <template> <textarea v-model="message" /> </template>

vue/no-this-in-before-route-enter.name: vue/no-this-in-before-route-enter
vue/no-this-in-before-route-enter.description: 禁止在 beforeRouteEnter 方法中使用 this
vue/no-this-in-before-route-enter.badExample: <script> export default { beforeRouteEnter() { this.method(); // Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'method' of undefined this.attribute = 42; if (this.value === 42) { } this.attribute = this.method(); }, }; </script>
vue/no-this-in-before-route-enter.goodExample: <script> export default { beforeRouteEnter() { // anything without this }, }; </script>

vue/no-undef-components.name: vue/no-undef-components
vue/no-undef-components.description: 禁止使用未定义的组件

vue/no-undef-properties.name: vue/no-undef-properties
vue/no-undef-properties.description: 禁止使用未定义的属性

vue/no-unsupported-features.name: vue/no-unsupported-features
vue/no-unsupported-features.description: 当你的 vue 版本较老时，禁用还未支持的语法

vue/no-unused-components.name: vue/no-unused-components
vue/no-unused-components.description: 禁止定义在 components 中的组件未使用
vue/no-unused-components.badExample: <script> import Foo from 'components/Foo.vue'; export default { components: { Foo, }, }; </script> <template> <Bar /> </template>
vue/no-unused-components.goodExample: <script> import Foo from 'components/Foo.vue'; export default { components: { Foo, }, }; </script> <template> <Foo /> </template>

vue/no-unused-properties.name: vue/no-unused-properties
vue/no-unused-properties.description: 禁止属性定义了却未使用

vue/no-unused-refs.name: vue/no-unused-refs
vue/no-unused-refs.description: 标签属性必须按规则排序
vue/no-unused-refs.reason: 识别有限制，无法识别在其他组件中使用的情况

vue/no-unused-vars.name: vue/no-unused-vars
vue/no-unused-vars.description: 模版中已定义的变量必须使用
vue/no-unused-vars.badExample: <template> <ul> <li v-for="item in items"> <span>Hello</span> </li> </ul> </template>
vue/no-unused-vars.goodExample: <template> <ul> <li v-for="item in items"> <span>Hello {{ item.message }}</span> </li> </ul> </template>

vue/no-use-computed-property-like-method.name: vue/no-use-computed-property-like-method
vue/no-use-computed-property-like-method.description: 禁止将计算熟悉当作方法调用
vue/no-use-computed-property-like-method.badExample: <script> export default { data() { return { dataString: 'dataString', }; }, computed: { computedReturnDataString() { return this.dataString; }, }, methods: { fn() { this.computedReturnDataString(); }, }, }; </script>
vue/no-use-computed-property-like-method.goodExample: <script> export default { data() { return { dataString: 'dataString', }; }, computed: { computedReturnDataString() { return this.dataString; }, }, methods: { fn() { this.computedReturnDataString; }, }, }; </script>

vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.name: vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for
vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.description: 禁止在同一个元素上使用 v-if 和 v-for 指令
vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.badExample: <template> <TodoItem v-if="complete" v-for="todo in todos" /> </template>
vue/no-use-v-if-with-v-for.goodExample: <template> <ul v-if="complete"> <TodoItem v-for="todo in todos" /> </ul> </template>

vue/no-useless-concat.name: vue/no-useless-concat
vue/no-useless-concat.description: 禁止出现没必要的字符串连接

vue/no-useless-mustaches.name: vue/no-useless-mustaches
vue/no-useless-mustaches.description: 禁止出现无用的 mustache 字符串
vue/no-useless-mustaches.badExample: <template> {{ 'Lorem ipsum' }} {{ 'Lorem ipsum' }} {{ `Lorem ipsum` }} </template>
vue/no-useless-mustaches.goodExample: <template> Lorem ipsum {{ foo }} </template>

vue/no-useless-template-attributes.name: vue/no-useless-template-attributes
vue/no-useless-template-attributes.description: 禁止模版中使用未生效的属性
vue/no-useless-template-attributes.badExample: <template> <template v-if="foo" class="heading">...</template> <template v-for="i in foo" :bar="i">...</template> <template v-slot:foo="foo" ref="input">...</template> <template v-if="foo" @click="click">...</template> </template>
vue/no-useless-template-attributes.goodExample: <template> <template v-if="foo">...</template> <template v-if="foo">...</template> <template v-else-if="foo">...</template> <template v-else>...</template> <template v-for="i in foo" :key="i">...</template> <template v-slot:foo>...</template> <template class="heading">...</template> <template :bar="i">...</template> <template ref="input">...</template> <template @click="click">...</template> </template>

vue/no-useless-v-bind.name: vue/no-useless-v-bind
vue/no-useless-v-bind.badExample: <template> <div v-bind:foo="'bar'" /> <div :foo="'bar'" /> </template>
vue/no-useless-v-bind.goodExample: <template> <div foo="bar" /> <div :foo="bar" /> </template>

vue/no-v-text-v-html-on-component.name: vue/no-v-text-v-html-on-component
vue/no-v-text-v-html-on-component.description: 禁止在组件中使用 v-text v-html
vue/no-v-text-v-html-on-component.badExample: <template> <MyComponent v-text="content"></MyComponent> <MyComponent v-html="html"></MyComponent> </template>
vue/no-v-text-v-html-on-component.goodExample: <template> <div v-text="content"></div> <div v-html="html"></div> <MyComponent>{{ content }}</MyComponent> </template>

vue/no-watch-after-await.name: vue/no-watch-after-await
vue/no-watch-after-await.description: 禁止在 await 之后调用 watch
vue/no-watch-after-await.badExample: <script> import { watch } from 'vue'; export default { async setup() { await doSomething(); watch(watchSource, () => {}); }, }; </script>
vue/no-watch-after-await.goodExample: <script> import { watch } from 'vue'; export default { async setup() { watch(watchSource, () => {}); await doSomething(); }, }; </script>

vue/object-shorthand.name: vue/object-shorthand
vue/object-shorthand.description: 必须使用 a = {b} 而不是 a = {b: b}
vue/object-shorthand.reason: 有时后者可以使代码结构更清晰

vue/one-component-per-file.name: vue/one-component-per-file
vue/one-component-per-file.description: 一个文件必须仅包含一个组件
vue/one-component-per-file.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'my-component', }; </script>

vue/order-in-components.name: vue/order-in-components
vue/order-in-components.description: 组件的属性必须为一定的顺序
vue/order-in-components.badExample: <script> export default { data() { return { foo: 'Hello', }; }, props: { bar: Number, }, name: 'World', }; </script>
vue/order-in-components.goodExample: <script> export default { name: 'World', props: { bar: Number, }, data() { return { foo: 'Hello', }; }, }; </script>

vue/padding-line-between-blocks.name: vue/padding-line-between-blocks
vue/padding-line-between-blocks.reason: 代码格式问题，最好由 Prettier 解决

vue/padding-line-between-tags.name: vue/padding-line-between-tags
vue/padding-line-between-tags.description: 模版中兄弟节点之间必须换行

vue/padding-lines-in-component-definitio.name: vue/padding-lines-in-component-definition
vue/padding-lines-in-component-definitio.description: 要求或禁止组件定义中的填充行

vue/prefer-define-options.name: vue/prefer-define-options
vue/prefer-define-options.description: 强制使用 defineOptions 而不是默认导出
vue/prefer-define-options.badExample: <script> /* ✗ BAD */ export default { name: 'Foo' }; </script> <script setup> /* ... */ </script>
vue/prefer-define-options.goodExample: <script setup> /* ✓ GOOD */ defineOptions({ name: 'Foo' }); </script>

vue/prefer-import-from-vue.name: vue/prefer-import-from-vue
vue/prefer-import-from-vue.description: 必须导入 vue 而不是 @vue/*
vue/prefer-import-from-vue.badExample: <script> import { createApp } from '@vue/runtime-dom'; import { Component } from '@vue/runtime-core'; import { ref } from '@vue/reactivity'; </script>
vue/prefer-import-from-vue.goodExample: <script> import { createApp, ref, Component } from 'vue'; </script>

vue/prefer-prop-type-boolean-first.name: vue/prefer-prop-type-boolean-first
vue/prefer-prop-type-boolean-first.description: Boolean 必须是组件 prop 的第一个参数

vue/prefer-separate-static-class.name: vue/prefer-separate-static-class
vue/prefer-separate-static-class.description: 在模版中必须用单独的 class 属性表达静态类的名字

vue/prefer-template.name: vue/prefer-template
vue/prefer-template.description: 必须使用模版字符串而不是字符串连接

vue/prefer-true-attribute-shorthand.name: vue/prefer-true-attribute-shorthand
vue/prefer-true-attribute-shorthand.description: v-bind 值为 true 时，必须省略显示声明
vue/prefer-true-attribute-shorthand.badExample: <template> <MyComponent v-bind:show="true" /> <MyComponent :show="true" /> </template>
vue/prefer-true-attribute-shorthand.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent show /> <MyComponent another-prop="true" /> </template>

vue/require-component-is.name: vue/require-component-is
vue/require-component-is.badExample: <template> <component /> <component is="currentComponnet" /> </template>
vue/require-component-is.goodExample: <template> <component :is="currentComponnet" /> <component v-bind:is="currentComponnet" /> </template>

vue/require-default-prop.name: vue/require-default-prop
vue/require-default-prop.description: props 如果不是 required 的字段，必须有默认值
vue/require-default-prop.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/require-direct-export.name: vue/require-direct-export
vue/require-direct-export.description: 必须直接使用 export default 导出组件

vue/require-explicit-emits.name: vue/require-explicit-emits
vue/require-explicit-emits.description: emits 属性必须包含 $emit() 中的值
vue/require-explicit-emits.badExample: <template> <div @click="$emit('bad')" /> </template> <script> export default { emits: ['good'], }; </script>
vue/require-explicit-emits.goodExample: <script> export default { emits: ['good'], methods: { foo() { this.$emit('good'); }, }, }; </script>

vue/require-macro-variable-name.name: vue/require-macro-variable-name
vue/require-macro-variable-name.description: 需要特定的宏变量名称

vue/require-name-property.name: vue/require-name-property
vue/require-name-property.description: 组件必须包含 name 属性

vue/require-prop-type-constructor.name: vue/require-prop-type-constructor
vue/require-prop-type-constructor.description: props 的取值必须是基本类型的构造函数，而不是字符串
vue/require-prop-type-constructor.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/require-prop-types.name: vue/require-prop-types
vue/require-prop-types.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/require-render-return.name: vue/require-render-return
vue/require-render-return.description: render 函数必须有返回值
vue/require-render-return.badExample: <script> export default { render(h) { if (foo) { return h('div', foo); } }, }; </script>
vue/require-render-return.goodExample: <script> export default { render(h) { return h('div', 'hello'); }, }; </script>

vue/require-slots-as-functions.name: vue/require-slots-as-functions
vue/require-slots-as-functions.description: this.$slots.default 必须被当作方法使用
vue/require-slots-as-functions.badExample: <script> export default { render(h) { var children = [...this.$slots.default]; var children = this.$slots.default.filter(test); }, }; </script>
vue/require-slots-as-functions.goodExample: <script> export default { render(h) { var children = this.$slots.default(); var children = this.$slots.default && this.$slots.default(); }, }; </script>

vue/require-toggle-inside-transition.name: vue/require-toggle-inside-transition
vue/require-toggle-inside-transition.description: transition 内部必须有条件指令
vue/require-toggle-inside-transition.badExample: <template> <transition><div /></transition> </template>
vue/require-toggle-inside-transition.goodExample: <template> <transition><div v-if="show" /></transition> <transition><div v-show="show" /></transition> </template>

vue/require-typed-ref.name: vue/require-typed-ref
vue/require-typed-ref.description: 要求 ref 和 shallowRef 函数需要强制类型化

vue/require-v-for-key.name: vue/require-v-for-key
vue/require-v-for-key.description: v-for 指令的元素必须有 v-bind:key
vue/require-v-for-key.badExample: <template> <div v-for="todo in todos" /> </template>
vue/require-v-for-key.goodExample: <template> <div v-for="todo in todos" :key="todo.id" /> </template>

vue/require-valid-default-prop.name: vue/require-valid-default-prop
vue/require-valid-default-prop.description: prop 的默认值必须匹配它的类型
vue/require-valid-default-prop.reason: 类型相关的约束交给 TypeScript

vue/return-in-computed-property.name: vue/return-in-computed-property
vue/return-in-computed-property.description: 计算属性必须有返回值
vue/return-in-computed-property.badExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo() { if (this.bar) { return this.bar; } }, }, }; </script>
vue/return-in-computed-property.goodExample: <script> export default { computed: { foo() { if (this.bar) { return this.bar; } return this.baz; }, }, }; </script>

vue/return-in-emits-validator.name: vue/return-in-emits-validator
vue/return-in-emits-validator.description: emits 中的方法必须有返回值
vue/return-in-emits-validator.badExample: <script> export default { emits: { qux: function () {}, quux(evt) { if (!evt) { return false; } }, }, }; </script>
vue/return-in-emits-validator.goodExample: <script> export default { emits: { foo(evt) { if (evt) { return true; } else { return false; } }, bar: function () { return true; }, baz(evt) { if (evt) { return true; } }, }, }; </script>

vue/sort-keys.name: vue/sort-keys
vue/sort-keys.description: props 的键名必须排好序

vue/static-class-names-order.name: vue/static-class-names-order
vue/static-class-names-order.description: class 的值必须按字母排序

vue/this-in-template.name: vue/this-in-template
vue/this-in-template.badExample: <template> <a :href="this.url"> {{ this.text }} </a> </template>
vue/this-in-template.goodExample: <template> <a :href="url"> {{ text }} </a> </template>

vue/use-v-on-exact.name: vue/use-v-on-exact
vue/use-v-on-exact.description: 当一个节点上出现两个 v-on:click 时，其中一个必须为 exact
vue/use-v-on-exact.badExample: <template> <button v-on:click="foo" v-on:click.ctrl="foo"></button> </template>
vue/use-v-on-exact.goodExample: <template> <button v-on:click.exact="foo" v-on:click.ctrl="foo"></button> </template>

vue/v-bind-style.name: vue/v-bind-style
vue/v-bind-style.description: 使用缩写的 : 而不是 v-bind:
vue/v-bind-style.badExample: <template> <div v-bind:foo="bar" /> </template>
vue/v-bind-style.goodExample: <template> <div :foo="bar" /> <div v-bind="baz"></div> </template>

vue/v-for-delimiter-style.name: vue/v-for-delimiter-style
vue/v-for-delimiter-style.description: v-for 中必须用 in 进行遍历

vue/v-on-event-hyphenation.name: vue/v-on-event-hyphenation
vue/v-on-event-hyphenation.description: 禁止在 v-on 的事件名使用横杠
vue/v-on-event-hyphenation.badExample: <template> <MyComponent v-on:customEvent="handleEvent" /> <MyComponent @customEvent="handleEvent" /> </template>
vue/v-on-event-hyphenation.goodExample: <template> <MyComponent v-on:custom-event="handleEvent" /> <MyComponent @custom-event="handleEvent" /> </template>

vue/v-on-handler-style.name: vue/v-on-handler-style
vue/v-on-handler-style.description: 禁止 v-on 的值使用函数调用的格式

vue/v-on-style.name: vue/v-on-style
vue/v-on-style.description: 使用缩写的 @click 而不是 v-on:click
vue/v-on-style.badExample: <template> <div v-on:click="foo" /> </template>
vue/v-on-style.goodExample: <template> <div @click="foo" /> </template>

vue/v-slot-style.name: vue/v-slot-style
vue/v-slot-style.description: 使用缩写的 #one 而不是 v-slot:one

vue/valid-attribute-name.name: vue/valid-attribute-name
vue/valid-attribute-name.badExample: <template> <p 0abc></p> <p -def></p> <p !ghi></p> </template>
vue/valid-attribute-name.goodExample: <template> <p foo.bar></p> <p foo-bar></p> <p _foo.bar></p> <p :foo-bar></p> </template>

vue/valid-define-emits.name: vue/valid-define-emits
vue/valid-define-emits.description: defineEmits 必须使用合法的语法

vue/valid-define-options.name: vue/valid-define-options
vue/valid-define-options.description: 强制执行有效的 defineOptions 编译器宏
vue/valid-define-options.reason: 可以防止错误的使用 defineOptions
vue/valid-define-options.badExample: <script setup> /* ✗ BAD */ defineOptions({ name: 'foo' }); defineOptions({ inheritAttrs: false }); </script>
vue/valid-define-options.goodExample: <script setup> /* ✓ GOOD */ defineOptions({ name: 'foo' }); </script>

vue/valid-define-props.name: vue/valid-define-props
vue/valid-define-props.description: defineProps 必须使用合法的语法

vue/valid-model-definition.name: vue/valid-model-definition
vue/valid-model-definition.description: model 的属性名必须合法
vue/valid-model-definition.badExample: <script> export default { model: { props: 'list', events: 'update', }, }; </script>
vue/valid-model-definition.goodExample: <script> export default { model: { prop: 'list', event: 'update', }, }; </script>

vue/valid-next-tick.name: vue/valid-next-tick
vue/valid-next-tick.description: 禁止调用 Vue.nextTick 或 vm.$nextTick 时不使用 await
vue/valid-next-tick.badExample: <script> import { nextTick as nt } from 'vue'; export default { async mounted() { nt(); Vue.nextTick(); this.$nextTick(); }, }; </script>
vue/valid-next-tick.goodExample: <script> import { nextTick as nt } from 'vue'; export default { async mounted() { await nt(); await Vue.nextTick(); await this.$nextTick(); }, }; </script>

vue/valid-template-root.name: vue/valid-template-root
vue/valid-template-root.description: template 的根节点必须合法
vue/valid-template-root.badExample: <template></template>
vue/valid-template-root.goodExample: <template> <div></div> </template>

vue/valid-v-bind.name: vue/valid-v-bind
vue/valid-v-bind.badExample: <template> <div> <div v-bind></div> <div :aaa></div> <div v-bind:aaa.bbb="foo"></div> </div> </template>
vue/valid-v-bind.goodExample: <template> <div> <div v-bind="foo"></div> <div v-bind:aaa="foo"></div> <div :aaa="foo"></div> <div :aaa.prop="foo"></div> </div> </template>

vue/valid-v-cloak.name: vue/valid-v-cloak
vue/valid-v-cloak.badExample: <template> <div v-cloak:aaa /> <div v-cloak.bbb /> <div v-cloak="ccc" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-cloak.goodExample: <template> <div v-cloak /> </template>

vue/valid-v-else.name: vue/valid-v-else
vue/valid-v-else.badExample: <template> <div v-else="foo" /> <div v-else:aaa /> <div v-else.bbb /> </template>
vue/valid-v-else.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="foo" /> <div v-else /> </template>

vue/valid-v-else-if.name: vue/valid-v-else-if
vue/valid-v-else-if.badExample: <template> <div v-else-if /> <div v-else-if:aaa="foo" /> <div v-else-if.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-else-if.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="foo" /> <div v-else-if="bar" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-for.name: vue/valid-v-for
vue/valid-v-for.badExample: <template> <div v-for /> <div v-for:aaa="todo in todos" /> <div v-for.bbb="todo in todos" /> <div v-for="todo in todos" is="MyComponent" /> <MyComponent v-for="todo in todos" /> <MyComponent v-for="todo in todos" :key="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-for.goodExample: <template> <div v-for="todo in todos" /> <MyComponent v-for="todo in todos" :key="todo.id" /> <div v-for="todo in todos" :is="MyComponent" :key="todo.id" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-html.name: vue/valid-v-html
vue/valid-v-html.badExample: <template> <div v-html /> <div v-html:aaa="foo" /> <div v-html.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-html.goodExample: <template> <div v-html="foo" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-if.name: vue/valid-v-if
vue/valid-v-if.badExample: <template> <div v-if /> <div v-if:aaa="foo" /> <div v-if.bbb="foo" /> <div v-if="foo" v-else /> <div v-if="foo" v-else-if="bar" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-if.goodExample: <template> <div v-if="foo" /> <div v-else-if="bar" /> <div v-else /> </template>

vue/valid-v-is.name: vue/valid-v-is
vue/valid-v-is.badExample: <template> <tr v-is:a="foo"></tr> <tr v-is.m="foo"></tr> <tr v-is></tr> <tr v-is=""></tr> <MyComponent v-is="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-is.goodExample: <template> <tr v-is="'blog-post-row'"></tr> <tr v-is="foo"></tr> </template>

vue/valid-v-model.name: vue/valid-v-model
vue/valid-v-model.badExample: <template> <input v-model /> <input v-model:aaa="foo" /> <input v-model.bbb="foo" /> <input v-model="foo + bar" /> <div v-model="foo" /> <div v-for="todo in todos"> <input v-model="todo" /> </div> </template>
vue/valid-v-model.goodExample: <template> <input v-model="foo" /> <input v-model.lazy="foo" /> <textarea v-model="foo" /> <MyComponent v-model="foo" /> <div v-for="todo in todos"> <input v-model="todo.name" /> </div> </template>

vue/valid-v-on.name: vue/valid-v-on
vue/valid-v-on.badExample: <template> <div v-on /> <div v-on:click /> <div v-on:click.aaa="foo" /> <div @click /> </template>
vue/valid-v-on.goodExample: <template> <div v-on="foo" /> <div v-on:click="foo" /> <div @click="foo" /> <div @click.left="foo" /> <div @click.prevent /> <div @click.stop /> </template>

vue/valid-v-once.name: vue/valid-v-once
vue/valid-v-once.badExample: <template> <div v-once:aaa /> <div v-once.bbb /> <div v-once="ccc" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-once.goodExample: <template> <div v-once /> </template>

vue/valid-v-pre.name: vue/valid-v-pre
vue/valid-v-pre.badExample: <template> <div v-pre:aaa /> <div v-pre.bbb /> <div v-pre="ccc" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-pre.goodExample: <template> <div v-pre /> </template>

vue/valid-v-show.name: vue/valid-v-show
vue/valid-v-show.badExample: <template> <div v-show /> <div v-show:aaa="foo" /> <div v-show.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-show.goodExample: <template> <div v-show="foo" /> </template>

vue/valid-v-slot.name: vue/valid-v-slot
vue/valid-v-slot.badExample: <template> <div v-slot="data"> {{ data }} </div> <my-component v-slot:one="data"> {{ data }} </my-component> <my-component v-slot="data"> {{ data }} <template v-slot:one> one </template> </my-component> <div> <template v-slot:one> one </template> </div> </template>
vue/valid-v-slot.goodExample: <template> <my-component v-slot="data"> {{ data }} </my-component> <my-component> <template v-slot:default> default </template> <template v-slot:one> one </template> </my-component> </template>

vue/valid-v-text.name: vue/valid-v-text
vue/valid-v-text.badExample: <template> <div v-text /> <div v-text:aaa="foo" /> <div v-text.bbb="foo" /> </template>
vue/valid-v-text.goodExample: <template> <div v-text="foo" /> </template>
